caller_intent: Renee from Ortho Carolina is following up on a previous message regarding a claim for Dillon Ricardo, who requires a form completion to proceed with surgery. She seeks assistance in ensuring the adjuster can contact the employer and employee, despite language barriers.
resolution_steps: Jessica acknowledges the call and confirms receipt of the request.
Renee provides patient details (Dillon Ricardo) and her contact information (336-659-4105).
Jessica agrees to note the request to contact Renee once the claim process initiates.
knowledge_required: Medical claims process for workers' compensation
Handling language barriers in claim communication
Coordination with adjusters and employer/employee stakeholders
summary: Renee from Ortho Carolina follows up on a claim for Dillon Ricardo, requiring a form completion to proceed with surgery. Communication challenges due to language barriers (Spanish-speaking patient/employer) are noted. Jessica agrees to set up a follow-up callback once the claim process initiates.
